quest_desc.qdesc: 1. 주교와 대화 2. 죽은 도시의 길목에서 화석 채취 3. 주교에게 보고

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$???$
(It seems like something is there, yet nothing can be seen.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
Geraint gave you some kind of an emblem, right? I'm talking about the one that allows you to enter where he is at.
Let me have a look at it.

$Bishop Ignacio$
What a delicate workmanship this is. I can't believe I am actually seeing a dragon's item. What a rare sight.
Make sure you don't lose it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The Bishop is deep in thought, and gives you a glance.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Hmm... Geraint is protecting the Prophet, but I am concerned about the defense of of the vicinities of Saint Haven.
Although the Black Dragon has disappeared, the monsters still remain.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is there anything I can help with?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Evil groups tend to become even more uncontrollable when they lose their leaders. But we have been severely damaged from the previous battle, and there is no way of knowing when we will get additional military supplies, as much of them were wasted during the battle.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Your help would be much appreciated, and it would make me feel reassured. I will go and check the armory, so you should briefly get some rest while you wait.

$Bishop Ignacio$
After checking the amoury I noticed that we are short on explosives.
How shameful would it be if our defensive lines were to collapse because we weren't able to secure enough explosives, right?

$Bishop Ignacio$
We must gather and then manufacture Fossils, which are used as materials for creating explosives.
You don't have to worry about the manufacturing process, as we have a separate logistics group for that.
So could you collect some Fossils so that we can secure enough of them?

$Bishop Ignacio$
Then go and collect some Fossils at Road to Death City.
There should be an abandoned bomb switch somewhere in the area. All you have to do is, blow it up.

$???$
(It seems like something is there, yet nothing can be seen.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
Oh, right. I'm only saying this for your own good, but let us keep this a secret, just bewteen the two of us.
It will just make things more difficult if the other nobles start to become suspirious.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Then go and collect some Fossils at Road to Death City.
There should be an abandoned bomb switch somewhere in the area. All you have to do is, blow it up.

$Bishop Ignacio$
You haven't collected enough Fossils yet. It does appear like you have more than enough...
But something seems to be missing, so go to Road to Death City again.

$???$
(It look like there something here, but we just could not find it.)

$???$
(Indeed, nothing is there. It must have been the sound of the wind.
There seems to be no more Fossils to collect here, so you should return and report the situation.)

$???$
(There is nothing here.)

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
You're already back?
Oh my, shake off that dust you have on your clothes.
Thank you for doing this. I will remember the contributions you have made.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Just as you have been doing, I hope that you will continue to help us solve the present problems that are being faced at Saint Haven.
There aren't many people that I know of whom I could trust, so it really comforts me to have such a talented person like you by my side.

$Bishop Ignacio$
This might annoy you a little, but there is just one thing I would like you to check......
Will you do me another favor? I'm asking you because there aren't many people that I could trust besides you.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Bishop Ignacio's Worries
journal.contents:
Ignacio, who was preparing for the ceremony, is worried about something. Listen to what it is.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio

journal.title: Collecting Fossils
journal.contents:
Go to Road to Death City and collect Fossils to be used for explosive materials.

Hermalte Port (Dark Mine Access) → Road to Death City
journal.destination: Collect Fossils at Road to Death City
journal.todo_msg: Please collect Fossils at Road to Death City.

journal.title: Annoying things
journal.contents:
Collect fossils to be used for explosive materials. If you find some things that are suspicious, then make sure to confirm everything so that no more fossils to be left.

Road to Death City → ???
journal.destination: Collect Fossils at Road to Death City
journal.todo_msg: I feel there is something around here, please do a check

journal.title: The Bishop's Compliments
journal.contents:
There are no more Fossils to collect. Deliver the Fossils you have collected to Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.destination: Deliver the Fossils to Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Please pass the Fossils to Bishop Ignacio
